title: WTB a handful of low-grade Detroit Tigers
author: lampertb

posts.post_title: WTB a handful of low-grade Detroit Tigers
posts.post_content:
Hello, everyone.  I am looking to buy just the following Detroit Tigers, lower or even altered condition being not only fine, but in fact optimal:

O'Leary port
Willetts pitching
Mullin/Mullen port
Cobb green (yeah right, I know)

Backs unimportant, though I can appreciate a rare back as much as the next guy.  Please let me know if you can help,

Richard
